detaileddescription.para:
Create a chart background objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new chart background
copy
pointer to a chart background object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created chart background

Allocate and add a data series to the chart
chart
pointer to a chart object
color
color of the data series
pointer to the allocated data series

Clear the point of a serie
chart
pointer to a chart object
serie
pointer to the chart's serie to clear

Set the number of horizontal and vertical division lines
chart
pointer to a graph background object
hdiv
number of horizontal division lines
vdiv
number of vertical division lines

Set the minimal and maximal y values
chart
pointer to a graph background object
ymin
y minimum value
ymax
y maximum value

Set a new type for a chart
chart
pointer to a chart object
type
new type of the chart (from 'lv_chart_type_t' enum)

Set the number of points on a data line on a chart
chart
pointer r to chart object
point_cnt
new number of points on the data lines

Set the opacity of the data series
chart
pointer to a chart object
opa
opacity of the data series

Set the line width or point radius of the data series
chart
pointer to a chart object
width
the new width

Set the dark effect on the bottom of the points or columns
chart
pointer to a chart object
dark_eff
dark effect level (LV_OPA_TRANSP to turn off)

Initialize all data points with a value
chart
pointer to chart object
ser
pointer to a data series on 'chart'
y
the new value for all points

Set the value of points from an array
chart
pointer to chart object
ser
pointer to a data series on 'chart'
y_array
array of 'lv_coord_t' points (with 'points count' elements )

Shift all data right and set the most right data on a data line
chart
pointer to chart object
ser
pointer to a data series on 'chart'
y
the new value of the most right data
Shift all data left and set the rightmost data on a data line
chart
pointer to chart object
ser
pointer to a data series on 'chart'
y
the new value of the rightmost data

Set update mode of the chart object.
chart
pointer to a chart object
update
mode

Set the style of a chart
chart
pointer to a chart object
type
which style should be set (can be only LV_CHART_STYLE_MAIN)
style
pointer to a style

Set the margin around the chart, used for axes value and labels
chart
pointer to an chart object
margin
value of the margin
Set the margin around the chart, used for axes value and labels
margin
value of the margin

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *chart, const char *list_of_values, uint8_t num_tick_marks, uint8_t major_tick_len, uint8_t minor_tick_len, lv_chart_axis_options_t options)
memberdef.name: lv_chart_set_x_ticks

detaileddescription.para:
Set the y-axis ticks of a chart
chart
pointer to a chart object
list_of_values
list of string values, terminated with , except the last
num_tick_marks
if list_of_values is NULL: total number of ticks per axis else step in ticks between two value labels
major_tick_len
the length of the major tick, AUTO if 0
minor_tick_len
the length of the minor tick, AUTO if 0
options
extra options
Set the x/y-axis ticks of a chart
chart
pointer to a chart object
list_of_values
list of string values, terminated with , except the last
num_tick_marks
if list_of_values is NULL: total number of ticks per axis else step in ticks between two value labels
major_tick_len
the length of the major tick, AUTO if 0
minor_tick_len
the length of the minor tick, AUTO if 0
options
extra options

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *chart, const char *list_of_values, uint8_t num_tick_marks, uint8_t major_tick_len, uint8_t minor_tick_len, lv_chart_axis_options_t options)
memberdef.name: lv_chart_set_y_ticks

detaileddescription.para:
Set the y-axis ticks of a chart
chart
pointer to a chart object
list_of_values
list of string values, terminated with , except the last
num_tick_marks
if list_of_values is NULL: total number of ticks per axis else step in ticks between two value labels
major_tick_len
the length of the major tick, AUTO if 0
minor_tick_len
the length of the minor tick, AUTO if 0
options
extra options

Get the type of a chart
chart
pointer to chart object
type of the chart (from 'lv_chart_t' enum)

Get the data point number per data line on chart
chart
pointer to chart object
point number on each data line

Get the opacity of the data series
chart
pointer to chart object
the opacity of the data series

Get the data series width
chart
pointer to chart object
the width the data series (lines or points)

Get the dark effect level on the bottom of the points or columns
chart
pointer to chart object
dark effect level (LV_OPA_TRANSP to turn off)

Get the style of an chart object
chart
pointer to an chart object
type
which style should be get (can be only LV_CHART_STYLE_MAIN)
pointer to the chart's style

Get the margin around the chart, used for axes value and labels
chart
pointer to an chart object
return
value of the margin

Refresh a chart if its data line has changed
chart
pointer to chart object
